review: I was excited about getting this, and using it. However it is stubborn sometimes and doesn't work. I have to turn the TV on and off and take the stick out and put it back in about 3 times each time I want to watch something.I also haven't figured out how to scroll quickly through genres and such... and a lot of the things they offer are not things I would normally watch. However, that part is user error and lack of knowledge on my part.The three stars is because of the issues with getting it to work and it not working all the time.

review: I love this thing!!  Amazon Prime is already the best thing going, but being able to take ALL my movies anywhere there is WIFI (Which is virtually everywhere now) is simply fantastic.Its a breeze to set up anywhere. The interface is simple and intuitive to use.  And I LOVE that you can buy or rent a movie instantly.  So great for kids.I can put a Disney movie on for my daughter and her friends then switch to more adult fun when they crash.The Fire TV Stick is exactly the way I want to watch my entertainment.  I would highly recommend this product.
